group_1.textLeft: Hm~mm...

group_1.textRight: Charu, what's wrong?@You seem to be deep in thought...
If something is troubling you,@you can consult with me.

group_1.textLeft: Mm~, I feel happy knowing that, but I'm not@sure how to talk about this...
Something feels wrong in the back of my mind,@but I don't know exactly why...

group_1.textRight: Then how about looking back to when@you first started feeling this uncertainty?
You might remember something that will help you@understand.

group_1.textLeft: You're right!
[chara:102601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Shizuka, you're such a great detective that@you'd even surprise Koichi Todoroki!

group_1.textRight: Hehe!

group_1.textLeft: I probably started feeling weird... Maybe it was@when I went out for the New Year's sales...
Ohh... This is the New Year's department store.

group_1.textRight: The crowds are quite large.@Charu, will you be okay?

group_1.textLeft: I won't smell malice now that@I have a handle on my unique magic,
so I'll be fine with this!

group_1.narration: "We are truly grateful to you@for visiting our department store,@and for your patience!@At the event corner of our basement first floor,@our artisan product exhibition will begin!"

group_1.textLeft: ...Product exhibition?
[chara:102651:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wawawa!@The people are all flowing our way!
Back then, I was definitely feeling bad.

group_1.textRight: Isn't that...just you feeling ill because of@the overwhelming crowds making you dizzy?
Are there any other moments where you@felt uncomfortable?

group_1.textLeft: Other moments...
After that, we left the department store and@went to the shopping district...
What's on display at that antiques store@over there – it has to be...!
It's a Koichi Todoroki badge – and it's even@a legendary first edition?!

group_1.textRight: ...It looks the same as the one@you always wear though, Charu.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102651:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]What are you talking about?!@See, the sparkling effect is so amazing on it.

group_1.textRight: Is this the aura of something only@a fan can understand?
What do you want to do?@Want to take a peek?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:102651:cheek_0][chara:102651:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102651:lipSynch_1]Yeah!

group_1.textRight: Apologies if it seems I'm staring, miss, but...
If you want to shop here,@you must come in with a parent.

group_1.textLeft: Wh...[chara:102651:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102651:motion_400][chara:102651:lipSynch_1]Whaaat?!

group_1.textRight: That would certainly put you in a bad mood.
But we have our answer now, don't we?
It's because you regret not being able@to buy that badge, is it not?

group_1.textLeft: ...That...may be it?

group_1.textRight: I'm sure it is.
Even if it is only now, why don't you@call your mother?

group_1.textLeft: It's not as simple as just calling her...
She can't just swoop into Kamihama City@like we can.
Besides, Mom's busy right now...
(That's right...)
(Since the beginning of this year, Mom's been@working for the village, hasn't she?)

group_1.textRight: Charu, it's a little early, but...
Here, your New Year's gift.@Use it carefully.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yaay! Thank you!

group_1.textRight: Okay, your mother's off to the village meeting then.

group_1.textLeft: Eh, today too?

group_1.textRight: At the beginning of the year there was a product@exhibition at the roadside station, remember?
I'm going to be participating there myself,@so I'm busy preparing for it.

group_1.textLeft: Is there any way I can help?

group_1.textRight: Your thoughts are enough.@Go enjoy the New Year in Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: Okaay...

group_1.narration: I really enjoyed this New Year's, but...@Mom...I wonder if she enjoyed it?

group_1.textLeft: I'm back~!

group_1.textRight: Welcome home, Charu.@[chara:800600:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:800600:cheek_0][chara:800600:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]...What's with that luggage?

group_1.textLeft: It's a souvenir for you, Mom!

group_1.textRight: [chara:800600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?!

group_1.textLeft: You may be busy with all the village stuff...
But I want you to enjoy the New Year too.
So...I bought lots of delicious things@from Kamihama!

group_1.textRight: ...Come on, I told you to spend your New Year's@gift carefully.

group_1.textLeft: To me, this was very carefully!

group_1.textRight: Alright, alright...@Thank you, Charu.
It's a little late, but...@I'll enjoy the New Year starting now.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]...Ehehe, I'm glad!
